Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors

Class DeleteActionFormViewProcessor

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.EntityViewProcessorAdapter
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.DeleteActionFormViewProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityViewProcessor
@Component public class DeleteActionFormViewProcessor extends EntityViewProcessorAdapter
Adds a delete button to the existing SingleEntityFormViewProcessor.FORM_BUTTONS if the AllowableAction.DELETE is present.
Since:
3.2.0
Author:
Steven Gentens

    • render

      protected void render(EntityViewRequest entityViewRequest, EntityView entityView, com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.builder.ContainerViewElementBuilderSupport<?,?> containerBuilder, ViewElementBuilderMap builderMap, com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilderContext builderContext)
      Description copied from class: EntityViewProcessorAdapter
      Build the general structure to render by adding the builders from builderMap to the containerBuilder in the right hierarchy. The containerBuilder represents the main body content.
      Overrides:
      render in class EntityViewProcessorAdapter
      Parameters:
      entityViewRequest - view request
      entityView - view generated
      containerBuilder - builder for the main content
      builderMap - named collection of builders
      builderContext - that should be used

    • createDeleteButton

      public static ButtonViewElementBuilder createDeleteButton(@NonNull @NonNull EntityViewContext entityViewContext, String currentViewName)
      Helper function to create a default delete button builder for a given entity. Will generate a link to the delete view for that entity, taking the optional current view name into account to generate an appropriate from url.

      By default the delete button is styled as an actual button with Style.DANGER.

      Parameters:
      entityViewContext - representing the current entity
      currentViewName - current view being rendered - can be null but might impact from url if present
      Returns:
      button builder
